1. Employee interest and right and employee care:

(1) The Company’s management rules (including employee benefit measures and retirement program, etc.) fully satisfy the labor laws and regulations. The Company has passed the certification of OHSAS18001 and obtained the license of career safety and health management system, which is helpful to eliminate or decrease employees’ working risks. (2) The Company’s products all comply with RoHS. The Company has also set up the customer service unit to process quality issues and customers’ complaints.
